sources.name: OrderDetailsSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as long,
		UnitCost as float,
		LineNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'long',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float') ~> OrderDetailsSource

sources.name: OrderSalesSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as double,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrderSalesSource

sinks.name: DVDOrderDetailsTransformSink
sinks.script:
DerivedColumns sink(input(
		SourceName as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DVDOrderDetailsTransformSink

sinks.name: DVDOrderSalesTransformSink
sinks.script:
DerivedColumnsOrders sink(input(
		SourceName as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DVDOrderSalesTransformSink

transformations.name: DerivedColumns
transformations.script:
DerivedSourceName derive(UniqueOrderID = concat(OrderDetailID, SourceName),
		UniqueMovieID = concat(MovieID, SourceName),
		Quantity = toInteger(Quantity),
		LineNumber = toInteger(LineNumber),
		UnitCost = toFloat(UnitCost)) ~> DerivedColumns

transformations.name: DerivedColumnsOrders
transformations.script:
DerivedSourceNameOrders derive(UniqueCustomerID = concat(CustomerID, SourceName),
		OrderDate = toString(toDate(OrderDate), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ShipDate = toString(toDate(ShipDate), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		TotalCost = toFloat(TotalCost)) ~> DerivedColumnsOrders
